NearMinDist.Wiki: The near minimum fade distance, e.g. the distance at which α = 0. In metres.

NearMaxDist.Wiki: The near maximum fade distance, e.g. where α = MiddleAlpha. In metres.

FarMinDist.Wiki: The far minimum fade distance, e.g. where α = MiddleAlpha. In metres.

FarMaxDist.Wiki: The far maximum fade distance, e.g. the distance at which α = 1. In metres.

MiddleAlpha.Wiki: The intermediate alpha value between near and far.
